prompts: Create a cute, pink Pokemon that resembles a baby with a round body and fluffy features.
Show me a chubby Pokemon with a smiling face and a small bunny-like ear on its head.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a plush toy, with soft curves and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a small, round Pokemon with a pink color scheme and a unique circular base.
Generate a fairy-type Pokemon that embodies joy and happiness with its adorable appearance.
Make a Pokemon with a simplistic design featuring a gentle smile and an overall soft look.
Give me a visual representation of a baby-like Pokemon that exudes warmth and friendliness.
